name: Grabeth Goateth
description:
You are a simple cultist who wants to grab a goat from some farmers to sacrifice!

WASD to move.

Press space to activate a flashlight you can't see to stun enemies if they detect you. However, you only have three charges good luck...

Also, pretend the tree are obstacles please and thank you.

Created By

Lucas Diamond: Programming

Bonus Prompt: Had to include a shitty flashlight. Which technically is in I guess cause it used to stun enemies but there are only three charges and you also can't see it.... you be the judge of that...

John Haley: Level Design & Organization

Bonus Prompt: Must Include Goat Noise. Appears at the end of the game.

Leo Gerendasi: Art

Bonus Prompt: The game must be Isometric. All the art is used on an Isometric grid.
